name: YouWare
tagline: World's first vibe coding community
description: Build, Share, Inspire, All Welcome. YouWare is a buzzing vibe coding community packed with AI-powered tools. Join 100K+ creators and 300K+ projects to get inspired and snag feedback. Need some inspiration? Check out these community-built projects!

name: Yapify
tagline: Speak your emails
description: Yapify is a voice-to-email extension that gets you to inbox zero 4x times faster without typing. Speak your response and get ready-to-send drafts in your style that are context-aware + perfectly formatted. Use voice commands to fill-in templates and add links!

name: Agents Base Phone Agents
tagline: World's first synthetic influencer network for content
description: Turn product photos into automated AI UGC and post it across our network of thousands of agents running on real phones to sustainably achieve 50x better CPM than ads. Introducing the world's first synthetic influencer network running on real phones.

name: Kanba
tagline: Open-source project management tool for modern teams
description: Ditch the bloat, skip the chaos. Kanba is a lightning-fast, open-source project management tool for makers who just want to build. No setup. No noise. Just clean workflows, beautiful UI, and full control. Self-host or go hosted. Designed for your pace.

name: Notebook AI
tagline: Your notes, supercharged by AI
description: Supercharge your note-taking with Notebook AI‚Äîyour smart AI assistant for content creation, transcriptions, mind maps, writing assistant, translations, and more.

name: AI Shorts
tagline: Turn ideas, long videos, or raw footage into viral shorts
description: Turn Ideas, Long Videos, or Raw Footage into Viral Shorts Instantly

name: flowy
tagline: automatically animated Screen Recordings
description: easy-to-use screen recorder for your Mac that will automatically create zoom effects based on your interactions, which you can later edit, along with the background, target aspect ratio, cursor, etc.

name: Convo
tagline: Memory & observability for LLM apps
description: Convo is the fastest way to log, debug, and personalize AI conversations. Capture every message, extract long-term memory, and build smarter LLM agents - with one drop-in SDK.

name: N8N2MCP
tagline: Turn your N8N workflow to MCP servers with just 3 clicks
description: Convert N8N workflows into Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that work seamlessly with Claude, Cursor, and other AI assistants. No coding required. Fully Open-source

name: Polyglotta
tagline: Multilingual translator for curious minds
description: Polyglotta is a multi-language translator and a community of like-minded polyglots, passionate about learning new languages and new cultures.

name: Grok CLI (Unofficial)
tagline: Bring the power of Grok into your terminal
description: An open-source AI agent that brings the power of Grok directly into your terminal. Built over the weekend with a few design principles in mind: ‚úÖ No LLM frameworks ‚úÖ No lobotomizing models ‚úÖ Hackable (MIT licensed)

name: TrackFi
tagline: Say goodbye to manual expense entry
description: AI Based Expense Tracking app which allows you to track expense without manual enteries. Trackfi automatically capture, categorize, and organize expenses from bank emails, receipts, and voice input using AI.

name: Nomadful ID
tagline: The universal health ID for humans
description: Nomadful ID is a new way to share your health data and log into online services, get personalised experiences, authenticate at hospitals, and so much more. All while keeping your data safe and under your control.

name: Prompthance
tagline: Transform images into perfect AI prompts instantly
description: Turn your image into well structured JSON prompt in seconds.

name: WhatsTeca
tagline: A library For Whatsapp
description: Organize your WhatsApp messages with hashtags and emojis. WhatsTeca helps you stay organized effortlessly.

name: Parrot TTS
tagline: Make anything an audiobook or podcast
description: Parrot TTS transforms any web text into remarkably human-like speech. Our advanced AI technology delivers natural-sounding voices that make listening a pleasure, eliminating the robotic experience of traditional text-to-speech solutions.

name: ScoreFlow
tagline: Transform your music sheets, now on Android
description: Convert now on android your music sheet to midi and musicxml ! And directly play them with your piano like synthesia.

name: PicMotionAI
tagline: Turn your images into scroll-stopping videos using AI
description: PicMotionAI turns static images into stunning motion videos, no editing skills needed. Perfect for Reels, Shorts, and ads.

name: LipFlix AI
tagline: Turn any picture into a singing video with lipflix
description: LipFlix turns a photo into a lip synced video using AI. Add a voice or song and make something weird cool or hilarious in seconds. No camera needed just your face and a little imagination.

name: Petshot Pro - AI Pet Portrait Generator
tagline: Beautiful AI Pet Portraits You and Your Family Will Love ü•∞
description: Our AI pet portrait generator can turn photos of your furry pets üê∂üêà into beautiful art that creates memories and brings joy and laughter into your home üíñ. Choose from 100+ artistic styles.
